QuestData.Title: The Wisdom of Niuzao
QuestData.Description: Niuzao, the Black Ox, rests in the temple to the west. He may know why the mantid are attacking.$b$bHe may, in fact, know much more than that.$b$bI will rendezvous with you at Niuzao Temple, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Ogo the Younger at Niuzao Temple in the Townlong Steppes.
QuestData.RewardText: Your Shado-Pan associate has spoken with me. Yes, Niuzao knows why the mantid are attacking. But he is not ready to tell you.$b$bNot yet.
